info.title: Loan Payment Skip Request
info.description:
A request from a borrower to a lender (credit institute) to skip one or more payments of the loan contract. The skipped payments will be paid: With Planned Final Payment, as additional installments at the end of the payment plan, increasing the term, as increased installment amount within current term. A Skip is non-payment by borrower of one or more payment of a loan contract. If an payment is skipped, interest calculation capital is not reduced on the original due date. Interest continues to be charged on the higher principal balance.
You can use this API to query and read skip requests.

Note:
The entity data model for loan payment skip request contains a subset of the attributes of the business object Loan Payment Plan Change Request.

Remark:
The service Loan Payment Skip Request is assigned to service group Transactional Banking. Use: Loan Payment Skip Request can be used to read skip requests.

x-sap-shortText: Query and read skip requests for loan payments using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: Is a request to query loan payment skip requests

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: Is a request to create a loan payment skip request

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
A UUID is a  universal unique identifier of LoanPaymentSkipRequest.  
GDT:NOSC_UUID

get.description: Is a request to read a loan payment skip request

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: Is a request to cancel an individual LoanPaymentSkipRequest. Note: The fields marked as nullable can be passed with blank value. But the field name has to be passed always.

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
A UUID is a  universal unique identifier of LoanPaymentSkipRequest.  
GDT:NOSC_UUID

post.description: Propose loan payment skip request is an inquiry to get the proposal with default values of  parameters including skip items required to create LoanPaymentSkipRequest.

LoanContractUUID.title: LoanContractUUID
LoanContractUUID.description: A globally unique identifier for a LoanContract.GDT: NOSC_UUID

EligibleSkippableItemsSelectionEndDate.title: EligibleSkippableItemsSelectionEndDate
EligibleSkippableItemsSelectionEndDate.description: The date at which the selection of eligible skippable item proposal end.GDT: Date

schema.title: Proposed Loan Payment Skip Request
schema.description: A Proposed Loan Payment Skip Request is the return for the ProposeLoanPaymentSkipRequest action. This will hold the default values and the payment which can be skipped.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET LoanPaymentSkipRequests HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

UUID.title: A UUID is a  universal unique identifier of LoanPaymentSkipRequest.

ID.title: Identifier of the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.
ID.description: ID is an identifier of the LoanPaymentSkipRequest. ID is a semantic key which uniquely identifies loan Payment Skip Request. Constraint: Filter: Only Eq is supported as logical operator GDT: LoanPaymentPlanChangeRequestID

LoanContractUUID.title: A globally unique identifier for a LoanContract.
LoanContractUUID.description: Constraint: Filter: Only Eq is supported as logical operator GDT: NOSC_UUID

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.
BusinessProcessChainAssignment.description: BusinessProcessChain is a chain of business processes carried out in a business scenarioBOCT: BusProcChnAssgmtFSElmnts

ChangeStateID.title: Identifies a change state.
ChangeStateID.description: Remark:  1) Property is required for subsequent update operation. 2) Property is used as ETag. GDT: ChangeStateID

LifeCycleStatusCode.title: LifeCycleStatusCode is the coded representation of the life cycle status of a LoanPaymentSkipRequest.
LifeCycleStatusCode.description: Constraint: Filter: Only Eq is supported as logical operator. GDT: LoanPaymentPlanChangeRequestLifeCycleStatusCode

LoanPaymentPlanSkippedInstallmentPayment.title: A coded representation of the mode of payment of a skipped installment of the payment plan of a loan.
LoanPaymentPlanSkippedInstallmentPayment.description: The mode of payment of a skipped installment of a payment plan of a loan.GDT: LoanPaymentPlanSkippedInstallmentPaymentModeCode

ReasonCode.title: ReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the cancellation of the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.

CancellationReasonCode.title: CancellationReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the cancellation of the LoanPaymentSkipRequest..

ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator.title: ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator
ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator.description: Indicates whether a charge for activation of LoanPaymentSkipRequest is requested to be waived or not.GDT: Indicator

PreviousInstallmentAmount.title: PreviousInstallmentAmount is the installmet amount before the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.

NewInstallmentAmount.title: NewInstallmentAmount is the installment amount after the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.

NewInstallmentStartDate.title: NewInstallmentStartDate is the calender date on which the new installment starts.
NewInstallmentStartDate.description: NewInstallmentStartDate is provided when LoanPaymentPlanSkippedInstallmentPaymentModeCode is either 1=Term Change or 2=Installment Amount Change.GDT: Date

FinalInstallmentAmount.title: FinalInstallmentAmount is the last installment amount for a loan contract.
FinalInstallmentAmount.description: In context of LoanPaymentSkipRequest this field holds the last installment amount for a loan contract as on skip executed date.GDT: Amount

FinalPaymentDate.title: FinalPaymentDate is the due date for FinalInstallmentAmount.
FinalPaymentDate.description: In context of LoanPaymentSkipRequest this field holds the due date for FinalInstallmentAmount as on skip executed date.GDT: Date

SkipDatePeriod.title: SkipDatePeriod is the period for which payments to be skipped.
SkipDatePeriod.description: Integrity Constraint: Either SkipDatePeriod or SkipItem must be provided but not both.GDT: DatePeriod

com.sap.gateway.default.loanpaymentskipr.title: LoanPaymentSkipRequest
com.sap.gateway.default.loanpaymentskipr.description: A LoanPaymentSkipRequest is a request from a borrower to a lender (credit institute) to to skip one or more payments of the loan contract or skip payments for a specific period of the loan contract. Integrity Condition: Any one of the following filter is allowed: ID ,LoanContractUUID ,LoanContractUUID and LifeCycleStatusCode

LoanContractUUID.title: A globally unique identifier for a LoanContract.

LoanPaymentPlanSkippedInstallmentPayment.title: A coded representation of the mode of payment of a skipped installment of the payment plan of a loan. The mode of payment of a skipped installment of a payment plan of a loan.Note: Default value 3=Balloon Amount Change is proposed.

ReasonCode.title: ReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.Note: Default value maintained on production control is proposed

AvailedAnnualMaximumNumberValue.title: The number of already performed Skips in the current year.

AvailedLoanTermMaximumNumberValue.title: The number of already performed skips during the term.

AllowedAnnualMaximumNumberValue.title: The maximum number of skips allowed for a loan account per calendar year.Note: Default value maintained on production control is proposed

AllowedLoanTermMaximumNumberValue.title: The maximum number of skips allowed for a loan account in total.Note: Default value maintained on production control is proposed

SkipItems.title: A SkipLoanPaymentItem are the items which are skipped or to be skipped by the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.In context of ProposedLoanPaymentSkipRequest this field holds the skippable items for the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.
SkipItems.description: Note: The skippable Planed Items/Due Item/Overdue Items are proposed.

DuePayment.title: DuePayment is a payment which is due or overdue.
DuePayment.description: DuePayment in context of LoanPaymentSkipRequest specifies unpaid bank account billing entries which are skipped or to be skipped.Note:DuePayment refers to bank account billing entry.

com.sap.gateway.default.loanpaymentskipr.description: CLOSED_DatePeriod is a period that is defined by two points in time. These points in time are expressed in calendar days. CLOSED_DatePeriod includes the start and the end time-point.

PlannedPayment.description: PlannedPayment is a payment planned for a key date of a loan payment plan. PlannedPayment in context of LoanPaymentSkipRequest specifies items which are skipped or to be skipped.

com.sap.gateway.default.loanpaymentskipr.title: SkipItems (for create)
com.sap.gateway.default.loanpaymentskipr.description: A SkipLoanPaymentItem are the items which are skipped or to be skipped by the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.In context of ProposedLoanPaymentSkipRequest this field holds the skippable items for the LoanPaymentSkipRequest.

com.sap.gateway.default.loanpaymentskipr.title: SkipItems (for update)

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$count](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptioncount) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionskip)

search.name: $search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [Searching](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionsearch)
